tool_description: Calculates beam deflections under various loading conditions using standard beam equations, considering different support conditions and load distributions.

beam_length.description: Length of beam in meters or feet

moment_of_inertia.description: Second moment of area in m⁴ or in⁴

elastic_modulus.description: Elastic modulus in GPa or psi

applied_load.description: Applied load magnitude in kN or lbs

load_type.description: Type of loading (point, uniform, triangular, trapezoidal)

load_position.description: Load position from left support as fraction of span (0-1)

allowable_deflection.description: Allowable deflection limit in mm or inches

analysis_points.description: Number of points for deflection analysis along beam length

error_messages: Invalid beam geometry: beam_length must be positive, moment_of_inertia must be positive
Invalid material properties: elastic_modulus must be positive
Unknown load type: Use one of [point, uniform, triangular, trapezoidal]
Unknown support condition: Use one of [simply_supported, cantilever, fixed_fixed, continuous]
Invalid load position: load_position must be between 0 and 1
Invalid analysis parameters: analysis_points must be between 5 and 100
usage: Provide beam_length, moment_of_inertia, elastic_modulus, applied_load, load_type, and support_condition. Optionally specify load_position, allowable_deflection, and analysis_points for detailed analysis.

max_deflection_location.description: Location of maximum deflection as fraction of span

analysis_positions.description: Positions along beam where deflections were calculated
